General.Name: Guangdong HongDa Blasting Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Hongda Holdings Group Co., Ltd. provides mining and civil explosion services in China. The company operates through three segments: Mining Engineering Services; Civil Blasting Equipment Production and Sales; and Defense Equipment Production and Sales. It offers open pit and underground mining services; defense equipment; and others, as well as sells civil explosive equipment and detonators. The company also produces and sells ammonium oil and emulsion explosives; explosives and detonators; sells electromechanical and chemical products; and designs and constructs blasting operations, as well as provides technology development, consulting, and transfer services; and mineral dressing and deep processing of non-metallic minerals. In addition, it is involved in the mine engineering construction general contracting, blasting and demolition engineering, mine management and green vegetation restoration, and general contracting of mining projects and housing construction projects activities, as well as investment operations, leasing business, marketing planning, engineering survey, and enterprise management activities; engineering and technology research and experimental development activities; and construction stone processing activities. Further, the company offers electromechanical and chemical products; dangerous goods transport services; military-related products; warehousing services; artificial intelligence industry application system integration services; construction machinery and equipment rental services; security technology prevention and security risk assessment services, as well as sells metal materials and steel. Additionally, it manufactures intelligent unmanned aerial vehicles. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Hongda Blasting Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Hongda Holdings Group Co., Ltd. in January 2022. Guangdong Hongda Holdings Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
General.Address: East Tower, Tianying Plaza, Guangzhou, China

4.Name: Mr. Guowen  Zhao
